text: Just attended a great talk at @CIOWaterCooler by @holly_cummins about making work more fun. Not ball pits and mandatory team building but actual fun by making work non-shit :)

author.name: 🇺🇦 Tom Geraghty
author.description: ⭕️Official. Experimentalist. Psychological Safety @RedHat. Studying MSc Public Health. Outdoorsy. He/him. Be kind. https://t.co/UdV3iAcjUo
